idea:
EQLIPSE, India's digital entertainment marketplace for artists, producers, creators, and freelancers to connect on specific projects. One can connect with different artists, hold different types of gigs at their venue, or simply connect with other artists to compose something great. A one-stop-shop website for all things Art & Entertainment.

EQLIPSE is a brainchild of Afshan Rustom Dastoor, a philosophy graduate, who is currently pursuing his diploma in Business administration from NMIMS, and is a promising entrepreneur. Please find his Linkedln profile attached down below.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/afshan-dastoor-550913205
name: EQLIPSE

idea:

idea: JAIBHARAT FINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED with years of risk-taking experience has allowed us to extend our support to the crowds that traditional financial systems have ruled out. jaifintech.com has a diversified product portfolio: loans to individuals and entrepreneurs, MSME loans, mortgage loans, and micro and micro loans. We believe that no dream can be fulfilled due to lack of resources. After many of these dreams have come true, our clients' confidence has fueled our own dream - to become the country's largest retail financial enterprise. To become India's leading financial company. We believe that customer satisfaction and quality assurance are key to success. That's why we value our customers and their needs as they are just the reason for our existence. Our specialists provide balanced advice that has no interest in misleading the client.
name: JAIBHARAT FINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
